Export.Routine:
INTRNPickList #include INConst #include COMSYS #include %occInclude PrintPickList(pidTRN) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Print the Pick List for the Transfer ; ; Params: None ; ; Returns: None ; ; ; History: ; 28-Oct-2008 HQN SR16088: Direct usage of screenwriting and ^WWWBACK, ; YBACK not handled correctly, workaround ; 12-Dec-2007 PPP SR15597: Created (this is a temporary print format) ; Will be superceded by a report. ; Currently Views exist for the Transfer Pick Header ; and Lines and CS can write their own reports uisng ; these views if necessary. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ANZM,strStatus,YDDSATZ set YBACK = "" kill ^WWWSOR(YUSER) set ANZM = 0 set strStatus = $$$OK if $$$ISOK(strStatus) { set YNOFOOT = 1 do List(pidTRN) if ANZM=0 do ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(46),1,,1) ; "No Data Available" } kill ^WWWSOR(YUSER) quit strStatus ; List : constructs Headers as "UES" and managers report ; ;====+========================================================================== ; <= | Title ;----+ T r a n s f e r O r d e r P i c k l i s t ; Issued By Location: xx (xxxxxxx) ;For Location: xx (xxxxxxx) Transfer Number: xxxxxxxxx ;Reference: xxxxxxx Status: x Delivery Date : xx/xx/xxxx ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;Number|Sending Storage|Item|Description|Quantity| Unit |Use By Date|Lot Number| Header - from "UES" ;------+---------------+----+-----------+--------+------+-----------+----------+ ; | | | | | | | | ANZ ;------+---------------+----+-----------+--------+------+-----------+----------+ ; | | | | | | | | ;------+---------------+----+-----------+--------+------+-----------+----------+ ; | | | | | | | | ;=============================================================================== ; P2 D2 D1 D1=>INART D1 D11 D4 D8 D7 List(pidTRN) ; ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Print the Pick List for the Transfer ; ; Params: None ; ; Returns: None ; ; ; History: ; 25-Jun-2009 PPP SR16682: Get the Bundle details directly from the Bundle Properties ; 15-Dec-2008 DavidR SR16302: Added two more columns for lot number and expiry ; date. Also modified the naming of the columns to be ; reliant on the form, to allow for any customisation. ; 12-Dec-2007 PPP SR15597: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new ANZSEIT,intLn,LFN,objVORGLANG,TEXT,UES,VORG1,YFELD set YNOFOOT = 1 do ^WWWBACK set VORG1 = $get(^INVORG(0,0,1)) set objVORGLANG = $get(^INVORGLANG(0,0,SPRACHE,1)) set TEXT=$$$INVORGLANGTextAfterPickList(objVORGLANG) set ANZSEIT=$piece(VORG1,Y,82) ; Number within side if ANZSEIT="" set ANZSEIT=30 set idForm = "INTFRPickLine" set UES = $$^WWWTEXT(207) ;1 Number set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINTFRPickLineSendingStockLocation) ;2 set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINTFRPickLineItem) ;3 set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWTEXT(32026) ;4 Item Description set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINTFRPickLineQuantity) ;5 set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINTFRPickLineUnit) ;6 set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINTFRPickLineUsebyDate) ;7 set UES=UES_Y_$$^WWWFELDNAME(idForm,"D",$$$FldINTFRPickLineLotNumber) ;8 set ANZM = 0 do Header(pidTRN) set YDDSATZ = 0 set intLn = 0 for { set intLn = $order(^INTFRPickLine(0,pidTRN,intLn)) quit:intLn="" set LFN = "" set YFELD = $get(^INTFRPickLine(0,pidTRN,intLn,1)) if ANZM'=0 { if ANZM#ANZSEIT=0 { write "" write "" ; do ZUSATZTEXT do FF^WWWW() do Header(pidTRN) ; FIXME : Should pass in UES } } do ANZ ; FIXME : Should pass in intLn } do LEER^WWWTAB(15,8) ; add columns from 6 to 8 do STOP^WWWTAB do ZUSATZTEXT(TEXT) quit ANZ ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Print the Pick List for the Transfer ; ; Params : None ; ; By Ref : YFELD ^INTFRPickLine record ; ; Returns: None ; ; ; History: ; 04-Apr-2011 shobby SR17714.4: Redirected previous change to INLP. ; 02-May-2011 shobby SR17714.2: Corrected Macro. ; 28-Apr-2011 shobby SR17714.2: Use CodeWithTSU formatting. ; 15-Sep-2010 GRF SR17534: Use Picked Quantity D11 rather than D3 so split ; line qty shown correctly (was repeating original) ; 24-Jun-2009 PPP SR16682: Get the Bundle details directly from the Bundle ; Properties ; 15-Dec-2007 DavidR SR16302: Modified to populate extra fields added (7 and 8) ; also modified call to use macro to make it readable. ; 12-Dec-2007 PPP SR15597: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dteUBD,idUnit,objItem,strItemDescription set ANZM = 1+ANZM write YCR do NL^WWWTAB ; 1. Line Number ;--------------------------------------- do NF^WWWTAB write YCR,intLn," " ; 2. Storage ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB ;SR17714.2 write $$$INTFRPickLineSendingStockLocation(YFELD)," " write $$CodeWithTSU2^INLP($$$INTFRSendingLocation($get(^INTFR(0,pidTRN,1))),$$$INTFRPickLineSendingStockLocation(YFELD)) ;SR17714.4 ; 3. Item ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB write $$$INTFRPickLineItem(YFELD)," " ; 4. Item Description ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB set objItem = $get(^INART(0,$piece(YFELD,Y,1),1)) set strItemDescription = $$$INARTSearchName(objItem) if $length(strItemDescription) > 15 { set strItemDescription = $extract(strItemDescription,1,15)_"..." } write strItemDescription," " ; 5. Quantity ;--------------------------------------- do ZWR^WWWTAB ;write $$$INTFRPickLineQuantity(YFELD)," " ; SR17534 write $$$INTFRPickLinePickedQuantity(YFELD)," " ; [IU] ; 6. Unit ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB set idUnit = $$$INTFRPickLineUnit(YFELD) ; [IU] write idUnit_" ("_$$$AppEnum("EINHEIT",idUnit)_")"," " ; 7. Use By Date ;--------------------------------------- do ZWL^WWWTAB set dteUBD = $$$INTFRPickLineUsebyDate(YFELD) if dteUBD'="" set dteUBD = $$^WWWDATE(dteUBD) write dteUBD," " ; 8. Lot No ;--------------------------------------- ; Added do ZWL^WWWTAB set idLot = $$$INTFRPickLineBatch(YFELD) write idLot," " write YCR do EL^WWWTAB quit ZUSATZTEXT(TEXT) ;ZUSATZTEXT new YI if ANZM'=0 if TEXT'="" do . write "
" . if '$find(TEXT,"<") do quit . . for YI=1:1 quit:$piece(TEXT,"|",YI,9999)="" write $piece(TEXT,"|",YI),"
",YCR ;NUR TEXT ;only Text . ; . for YI=1:1 quit:$piece(TEXT,"|",YI,9999)="" write $piece(TEXT,"|",YI),YCR ;HTML write YCR do FF^WWWW() write YCR write YCR quit Header(pidTRN) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 15-Sep-2008 GRF replace "I" with "loop" ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new loop do Title(pidTRN) do START100^WWWTAB ;STARTEN DER ÃœBERSCHRIFT ;launching the superscription write "" do NL^WWWTAB for loop=1:1 quit:$piece(UES,Y,loop,99)="" do NHWZ^WWWTAB write $piece(UES,Y,loop)," " do EH^WWWTAB do EL^WWWTAB write "" quit Title(pidTFR) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 02-Jun02911 GRF SR17723: close Font tags ; 12-Dec-2007 PPP SR15597: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new dteTransfer,idFromLoc,idRef,idToLoc,intStatus,objRecord,objTFR,strDescription set objTFR = $get(^INTFR(0,pidTFR,1)) set idFromLoc = $$$INTFRSendingLocation(objTFR) set idToLoc = $$$INTFRReceivingLocation(objTFR) set idRef = $$$INTFRDispatch(objTFR) set intStatus = $$$INTFRStatus(objTFR) do START1000^WWWTAB write YCR,"" write YCR,"" write "" ;--------------------------------------- write YCR,YCR,"" write YCR,"" write YCR,"
" write " " write $$^WWWFORMNAME("INTFR")_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(32503) ; "Work Orders" write " " write "
" write YCR,"" write $$^WWWTEXT(33404)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(388)_": "_idFromLoc_" ("_$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,0,idFromLoc,1)),Y,1)_")" ; "Issued By Location" write "" write YCR,"
" ;--------------------------------------- write YCR,YCR,"" write YCR,"" write YCR,"" write YCR,"",YCR write "
" write "" write $$^WWWTEXT(32807)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(388)_": " ; "For Location" write idToLoc ; To location if idToLoc'="" write " ("_$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,0,idToLoc,1)),Y,1)_")" ; Location Name write "
" write $$^WWWTEXT(32247)_": " ; "Reference" (route?) write idRef write "" write YCR,"		",YCR write "" write " " write "
" write $$^WWWTEXT(32781)_": "_intStatus ; "Status" write "" write YCR,"		",YCR write "" if pidTFR '= "" { write $$^WWWFELDNAME("INTFR","P",1)_": "_pidTFR write "
"_$$$Text(32168)_": "_$$^WWWDATE($$$INTFRDueDate(objTFR)) ; "Delivery Date" } write "" write YCR write "
",YCR ;--------------------------------------- do EH^WWWTAB do EL^WWWTAB do STOP^WWWTAB quit
